author: norman
msg: Allow to browse content of a MailQueue, the same should be added for browsing via JMX. See JAMES-1180

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Jeroen van der Wal "When audit log is enabled it creates log transactions even when there are no changes" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4076) - OFBIZ-4076

The createEntittyAuditLogSingle function creates a record in the AuditLog entity even when there's no change. This patch only logs new, changed and deleted values. Also, all changes in the same transaction will get the same change date.
After applying this patch the overhead of the AuditEntityLog is recuded from 32% to 25%.
There's even more room for performance increase: a findOne search for the previous entity is done for every field that's enabled.
